about_the_game:
Welcome to Frankfurt! Explore the rails of a sprawling modern metropolis, and take control of regional, commuter and inter-city express duties in Train Sim World 5. Lean into the action with the all-new DB BR 411 ICE-T; tilting heavy metal optimised for smooth and faster travel. An extravaganza of electric traction awaits!

As a vital commuter, regional and international hub, the massive Frankfurt (Main) Hbf needs little introduction and is regarded as one of the most important stations in Germany. All traffic in all directions; take ICE and regional trains on a sharp curve out of the city Eastward and wind through the Kinzig Valley to the highspeed interchange at Fulda.

Tilting traction is twinned with an array of Deutsche Bahn’s finest. From the classic cab of the DB BR 114 to the modern screens of the DB BR 193 Vectron; embark on regional passenger and heavy freight in-between the ICE action.

In Train Sim World 5, become a driver or conductor aboard DB passenger services, and race along the varied rails between Frankfurt and Fulda. Enjoy an engaging mix of motive power on a constantly changing route profile – featuring both high speed and tilt-inducing turns.

Key Features

  • Kinzigtalbahn route between Frankfurt (Main) Hbf and Fulda

  • BR 411 ICE-T in DB ICE livery

  • BR 114 electric locomotive in DB red livery

  • BR 146.2 electric locomotive in DB red livery

  • Doppelstock coaches & cab car in DB red livery

  • BR 193 Vectron in DB red livery

  • Kjils, Sggmrss and Habbins freight wagons

  • Highly detailed, feature-rich, driving cabs

  • True-to-life performance, suspension and handling

  • Accessible Tutorials on the Training Center

  • A number of engaging Scenarios and an authentic timetable

  • Complete the Kinzigtalbahn timetable with the FlixTrain Vectron

  • Journey Mode tying together Training, Scenarios and Timetabled Services

  • Additional Timetable layers add additional playable and AI traffic, including ICE services with Kassel - Würzburg’s DB ICE 1

  • A selection of Route Tasks to complete

  • Explore the route and trains in Free Roam

  • Hop to Schnellfahrstrecke Kassel - Würzburg (available separately) on foot

  • Livery Designer, Formation Designer and Scenario Planner compatible. Share your creations with the Creators Club

  • Powered by Dovetail Games’ proprietary SimuGraph® vehicle dynamics engine and Unreal Engine 4® technology

  • Download size: 10.6 GB
detailed_description:
Welcome to Frankfurt! Explore the rails of a sprawling modern metropolis, and take control of regional, commuter and inter-city express duties in Train Sim World 5. Lean into the action with the all-new DB BR 411 ICE-T; tilting heavy metal optimised for smooth and faster travel. An extravaganza of electric traction awaits!

As a vital commuter, regional and international hub, the massive Frankfurt (Main) Hbf needs little introduction and is regarded as one of the most important stations in Germany. All traffic in all directions; take ICE and regional trains on a sharp curve out of the city Eastward and wind through the Kinzig Valley to the highspeed interchange at Fulda.

Tilting traction is twinned with an array of Deutsche Bahn’s finest. From the classic cab of the DB BR 114 to the modern screens of the DB BR 193 Vectron; embark on regional passenger and heavy freight in-between the ICE action.

In Train Sim World 5, become a driver or conductor aboard DB passenger services, and race along the varied rails between Frankfurt and Fulda. Enjoy an engaging mix of motive power on a constantly changing route profile – featuring both high speed and tilt-inducing turns.

  • Download size: 10.6 GB
